Summary: it looked as if they were coming towards us, something out of a movie!
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the drive thru with my girls at panda express. My daughter said what the heck is that Mom?! I thought it was an invasion. They were moving slowly towards US, then one broke away from the cluster to get in front. Then I got in my car and my girls said mom they are gone. I asked where and they said they went up and were just gone. We were excited bewildered, although my 6 year old was really scared! I didn't see them leave because at that moment I had to pull foward to order. From when I shut off my video to when I got back in my car theycwere gone that fast!
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in North Highlands

This sighting has never been favorited.
